info.name: Nation Builder Night
info.description: A dark mode skin for the new NationBuilder Radius Control Panel made using the Google Material Design 2 Dark Mode Colour Palette.
info.additionalInfo:
~Version 1.3 (28-Jan-20) ~
◦ Updated Search Icon 
◦ Rewritten Form Control Style
◦ Support for Filters Screen
◦ Fixed other Issues in People Section

~Version 1~
◦Skin is made provide feedback please.
